ext_description.p:
A Reference_geometric_representation_relationship.sgm is a type of . One purpose of a Reference_geometric_representation_relationship is the association of a with its to create a resultant . In the case where the placement is not supplied, both are in the same geometric context.
Another purpose of a is to relate a representation of a design view and a representation of a usage view for design archival purposes. In this case a placement shall not be supplied.
A Reference_geometric_representation_relationship is included to support composition of basic geometric features in support of templates. Component_2d_location and other types of location Application Objects support composition of assembly or interconnect shapes. Usage_concept_usage_view_relationship supports composition of shapes in the usage view. The name is generic to support extensibility. Mirroring is possible by use of Cartesian_transformation_operator_2d. The use of mirroring should be carefully considered to avoid confusion in receiving systems. Mirroring of symmetric constructs should be avoided. Mirroring in the case of design and usage views shall be prohibited.
ext_description.example: A Reference_geometric_representation_relationship would be used to transform or reference a circle shape for a detail into an overall template shape. In this way there would be one instance of a circle of a given size in the template model.
